pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compute Contributional Diversity Metrics // Compute alpha and beta contributional diversity metrics, which is intended for linking taxonomic and functional microbiome data. See 'GitHub' repository for the tutorial: https://github.com/gavinmdouglas/FuncDiv/wiki. Citation: Gavin M. Douglas, Sunu Kim, Morgan G. I. Langille, B. Jesse Shapiro (2023) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btac809.
